title: I was banned for 114 on League of Legends forum/bored.
body:
SO yup i raged from a losing streak and got on "Boards" and posted that i needed a someone to boost my promos.

A couple days later I see a message saying "your banned till 2130". I find it strange my actual account is not banned but my Forum account is?

EXPLAIN PLEASE MY MIND IS BLOWN 

Thanks

replies.body: If you had received the boost then your game account would be banned, you didn't so it's not, but as far as boards are concerned asking for a boost is still no bueno. Anything past that and you'd have to ask the mod that banned you which just isn't possible.
